column4: hi  I''ve installed ubuntu 8.04 on a 1.7ghz 512 ram IBM laptop the other day. today I herd that xbunubtu could prove faster - is there a real difference? tnx
stick with gnome, unless you find it sluggish.
you can safely try a parallel xubuntu installation -- just 'sudo apt-get install xubuntu-desktop' and choose at the gdm login which type of session to run.
my personal cutoff for choosing xubuntu over ubuntu is 1 GHz
